titleStmt.title: Ah Chon v. E Delany. Writ of Habeas Corpus.

publicationStmt.authority: Bring Me the Body: A Digital & Print History of Marginalized Habeas Corpus Petitioners in the North American West, 1804-1912

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Ah Chon v. E Delany. Writ of Habeas Corpus.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Whereas an application has been made and to Statue to the Hon J. E. Wyche Judge of the U.S. District Court 1st Judicial District of said Territory and an order granted for a Writ of Habeas Corpus for the body of Ah Chon Chinaman who it is alledged is unlawfully restrained of his liberty

Therfore in the name of the United States you are Commanded to bring the body of the said Ah Chon Chinaman with the cause of his detentions forthwith before the Hon J. E. Wyche Judge at Chambers in the City of Walla Walla County and Territory aforesaid to do and receive what shall be ordered concerning him and have then & there this writ
Witness the Hon J.E. Wyche Judge aforesaid and the Seal of the Court this the 2nd day of April 1869
